CustomField.description: Internal field used by BAM/Merchant portal when inviting a user to CSSO. This stores the date/time of the last invite and is used to determine when to show the 'Reinvite' button within the UI. This should not be set directly.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Internal field used by BAM/Merchant portal when inviting a user to CSSO. This stores the date/time of the last invite and is used to determine when to show the 'Reinvite' button within the UI. This should not be set directly.
CustomField.label: BAM CSSO Last Invite
